text_block_list.text: (Crunch, crunch, crunch——)

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
Found one…… 
If there's one, then there should be more……found them!

A day off during Summer Training Camp. Furioso was 
engaging in one of her other hobbies, clam hunting.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
A good haul of clams. What do you think of 
these clam-hunting skills I honed in Sanbanze!?

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
Heh, I can still get more. 
……Hm? There's a small hole in the sand……?

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
A clam's siphon? How lucky. 
Seems like it's a big one.

Saying that, Furioso began digging through the 
sand at her feet. But, that shimmering light……

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text: Ah!

It was a piece of metal wire garbage. 
As soon as it was scraped out of the sand, a sharp tip whipped out.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
Yeah…… 
Ah! Trainer……blood!

When I looked at the back of my hand, there was a very thin cut. 
I didn't even realize it, but I must have gotten cut by it.
choice_data_list: I'm fine. I'm glad you're okay too
I'm fine. I'm glad you're okay too

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
Wha……!? 
That's not fine at all!

Surprisingly, Furioso raised her voice. 
It wasn't that big a deal though……

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
Bacteria could get in and cause an infection. 
Come with me. Let's get it washed and disinfected.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text: This should be good……

Furioso had borrowed a first aid kit and treated my wound. 
The cleanly wrapped tape showed just how serious she was.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
No……rather, I should be the one thanking you. 
For covering for me.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
You're always looking out for me. 
However……

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
You really need to take care of yourself. 
Didn't something like this happen just a little while ago?

Now that she mentioned it, I caused her quite a bit 
of trouble when I felt sick on that station platform. 
I couldn't help but feel my own unreliability.

If something happened to me, it would negatively impact 
training too. It could also affect her dream too.
choice_data_list: I'll work on it, for Funabashi too!

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
Funabashi……there's that too, but…… 
That's not it, I just want you to take better care of your body……

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
What do you mean 『Huh?』……? Besides, what happened 
just now has nothing to do with Funabashi, does it?

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
(We care about each other……we have a bond…… 
Trainer even protected me)

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
(For a while now, they've been looking after me. 
I'm just as worried about them……but then……)

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text: It can't be, that you don't understand……?

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
No……I'm fine. 
That was just unexpected.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
But now, I understand. 
Thinking I didn't have to say it……that was naive of me.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
………I want a little bit of time to think. 
Excuse me.

What exactly just happened? 
Did I do something that upset her……?

——A few hours later. One of the training camp caretakers 
delivered a letter to me. It started with a seasonal greeting……

text_block_list.name: Letter
text_block_list.text:
『——I have something to report to you. Today at 17:00, 
I'll be at the location written below. From, Furioso』

Written so formally……it must be a really important discussion. 
Our earlier exchange worried me too.

——I would accept whatever she said. 
After preparing myself, I went to the meeting location.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
So you've come, Trainer. 
Let's get right in to it……I have something that I need to tell you.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
Where should I start……? 
First, this is my own misunderstanding……I'm reflecting on it.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
『It doesn't need to be put in to words』, that's what I thought. 
However, I think I need to say it clearly. Ummmm, in other words……

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text: I consider you very important to me, Trainer!
I was surprised by her words. What was this all of a sudden?

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
There is a deep bond between us, that's what I think. A strong bond 
created through Funabashi. Unlike any other, something special……

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
But you think I'm only 『Thinking about Funabashi』! 
Like a business partner! But that's wrong!

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
That's not the only thing. Maybe that's how it was 
at the start. But now, it's not just Funabashi……

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
I understand that you care a lot about me. 
I feel the same way. But……!

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
Even then……you didn't know that! 
Like that, it's not good!

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
Therefore, I think we need to better understand each 
other's feelings. ……That's all. Do you understand now?

The one that didn't understand was me……I think. 
I'm sure she must have been thinking and thinking all about this.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
Likewise, I'm grateful to you for hearing me out. 
………

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
Trainer, now that our talk is over, I had a suggestion, 
how about having a little fun on the way back?

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
I want to create some memories with 
you in a place other than Funabashi.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
To make up for all the hard work during Training 
camp, let's let loose. Fufuu……the resort 
facilities seem like they'll be really fun.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text: Compared to Funabashi's pools, it might be an even match!
